settings.text:
VAR▴VAR designers craft only the best and unique pieces of jewelry for you. All of our accessories were created as a piece of art.

But we know that some of you want to have an extraordinary experience. That’s why every VAR▴VAR client can order a piece of jewelry with his own unique design.

Here are two options for that:

First one. If you want your jewelry to be crafted in a single copy, the price will be a bit bigger.  A silver ring will cost from  $400,  a golden one – about $1000.

Second one: The item will be created for you, but then we will be able to sell the same ones to other clients. The approximate price for a silver ring will vary from $200, for a gold one – from

VAR▴VAR designers craft only the best and unique pieces of jewelry for you. All of our accessories were created as a piece of art.

But we know that some of you want to have an extraordinary experience. That’s why every VAR▴VAR client can order a piece of jewelry with his own unique design.

Here are two options for that:

First one. If you want your jewelry to be crafted in a single copy, the price will be a bit bigger.  A silver ring will cost from  $400,  a golden one – about $1000.

Second one: The item will be created for you, but then we will be able to sell the same ones to other clients. The approximate price for a silver ring will vary from $200, for a gold one – from $500.

If you are ready to do order such accessories, you need to fill out this form and indicate there:

Right now there are a bunch of options for the stones that can be installed:

Gemstones: amethyst, garnet, topaz, citrine, sapphire, ruby, emerald, diamond

Silicon Stones: green, blue, red, yellow, pink, brown, black, clear, orange, purple.

After that, you need to write a detailed description of the design and attach a photo (if you have one) as an example.

When we receive the form we will contact you to confirm the order.

Next, VAR▴VAR designers will sketch on paper, and we will send it to you. You can give a few edits if you want. When you approve our sketch, we will calculate the approximate cost of the accessories. After that, you need to pay half of the cost.

When we receive money, we create a 3D model of the jewelry and send the illustrations to you to approve them. After that,  you need to pay for the second part of the item.

Finally, our craftsmen make your jewelry in the metal, we photograph, and send you a photo (by email) and the jewelry itself (by mail).

settings.title: The type of jewelry (a ring, pendant, earrings, bracelets, etc.)
The type of metal (silver, yellow gold, white gold)
The type of stone to insert (Diamond, Sapphire, Emerald, Cubic Zirconia stone, etc. or without a gemstone)
